text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Digital, Shakur! When I've got a grand 
castle one day, what say you gals 'bout 
spending the good times there?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
You mean live togetherrr……!? 
I-I-I'm not worthy!! Even sharing the 
air we breathe right now is an honor!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
First off, what castle? Where and how are 
you even gonna build something like that?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
……It doesn't make any sense. 
And second, you should invite 
people who like being in groups.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
That's why! The exact reason 
I want you gals specifically!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Both of ya have intense passion that you 
keep secret…… It's because you don't 
seek out other people that ——

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
That I wanna invite you! 
Like "come hang out anytime", y'know!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
W-What compassion……!! I can't help but 
bow down before your benevolence……!!!
